title: A sermon preached at Pauls Crosse the xiiii day of December by Thomas Leuer.
author: Lever, Thomas, 1521-1577.
publisher: By Jhon Day, dwellyng ouer Aldersgate,
notes: Place of publication and publisher from colophon.
STC (2nd ed.) lists imprint date as 1551.
"Cum priuilegio ad imprimendum solum. Per Septennenium."
Reproductions of original in the British Library.
